name: El Murciélago Beach
description: The most visited beach in the city, ideal for swimmers and water sports enthusiasts like kite-surfing. Its unique shape resembles a bat.

name: Santa Marianita Beach
description: Known for its calm atmosphere and natural beauty, popular for water sports and a peaceful getaway.

name: San Lorenzo Beach
description: A less crowded beach, perfect for a rustic and authentic environment. Great for local cuisine and a quiet seaside experience.

name: Mall del Pacífico
address: Av. 24 de Mayo and Calle 104, Manta
description: The largest shopping mall in the city, featuring 136 stores, a 5-star hotel, and panoramic views of El Murciélago Beach.

name: Manta Port
description: One of Ecuador’s most important fishing ports, known for its strong influence on the local economy and vibrant fishing industry.

name: Central Bank Museum
description: A cultural space hosting exhibitions about the history and culture of the region, providing deep insight into Manabí’s identity.

name: Manta Central Park
description: The heart of the city, surrounded by restaurants, shops, and lively urban life. Perfect starting point to explore Manta.

name: Commerce Festival
description: An annual event celebrating Manta’s commercial identity, featuring cultural, gastronomic, and musical activities. A great opportunity to experience the warmth of locals.
